sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Anomaly } from '../types/insights'; import { AlertTriangle, TrendingUp, GitBranch, Zap, ChevronDown, ChevronRight, Filter, Search } from 'lucide-react'; interface AnomaliesTableProps { anomalies: Anomaly[]; } const AnomaliesTable: React.FC = ({ anomalies }) => { const [expandedRows, setExpandedRows] = useState>(new Set()); const [filterSeverity, setFilterSeverity] = useState('all'); const [filterType, setFilterType] = useState('all'); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const toggleRow = (id: string) => { const newExpanded = new Set(expandedRows); if (newExpanded.has(id)) { newExpanded.delete(id); } else { newExpanded.add(id); } setExpandedRows(newExpanded); }; const getSeverityColor = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case 'critical': return 'badge-error'; case 'high': return 'badge-warning'; case 'medium': return 'badge-primary'; case 'low': return 'badge-success'; default: return 'badge-neutral'; } }; const getTypeIcon = (type: string) => { switch (type) { case 'burst_correlation': return ; case 'lead_lag': return ; case 'pmi_correlation': return ; case 'change_attribution': return ; default: return ; } }; const getTypeColor = (type: string) => { switch (type) { case 'burst_correlation': return 'text-primary-600'; case 'lead_lag': return 'text-success-600'; case 'pmi_correlation': return 'text-secondary-600'; case 'change_attribution': return 'text-accent-600'; default: return 'text-neutral-600'; } }; const formatTypeLabel = (type: string) => { switch (type) { case 'burst_correlation': return 'Burst Correlation'; case 'lead_lag': return 'Lead-Lag'; case 'pmi_correlation': return 'PMI Co-occurrence'; case 'change_attribution': return 'Change Attribution'; default: return type; } }; const filteredAnomalies = anomalies.filter(anomaly => { const severityMatch = filterSeverity === 'all' || anomaly.severity === filterSeverity; const typeMatch = filterType === 'all' || anomaly.type === filterType; const searchMatch = searchQuery === '' || anomaly.message.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || anomaly.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()); return severityMatch && typeMatch && searchMatch; }); const renderDetails = (anomaly: Anomaly) => { const details = anomaly.details; switch (anomaly.type) { case 'burst_correlation': return (
{/* Primary Metrics */}
Correlation
R
{details.correlation?.toFixed(3)}
Pearson Correlation
P-value
P
{details.p_value?.toExponential(2)}
Statistical Significance
Aligned Bursts
B
{details.aligned_bursts}
Synchronized Events
{/* Detailed Metrics Grid */}
Statistical Analysis
Sample Size: {details.sample_size}
Total Buckets: {details.total_buckets}
Burst Alignment Rate: {((details.aligned_bursts / details.total_buckets) * 100)?.toFixed(1)}%
Confidence Metrics
Confidence Interval: [{details.confidence_interval?.[0]?.toFixed(3)}, {details.confidence_interval?.[1]?.toFixed(3)}]
Significance Level: {details.p_value < 0.001 ? 'Very High' : details.p_value < 0.01 ? 'High' : details.p_value < 0.05 ? 'Medium' : 'Low'}
Correlation Strength: {Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.8 ? 'Very Strong' : Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.6 ? 'Strong' : Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.4 ? 'Moderate' : 'Weak'}
{/* Interpretation */}
Interpretation

This burst correlation shows a {Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.8 ? 'very strong' : Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.6 ? 'strong' : 'moderate'} temporal relationship with {details.aligned_bursts} synchronized events out of {details.total_buckets} total buckets. The p-value of {details.p_value?.toExponential(2)} indicates {details.p_value < 0.001 ? 'very high' : details.p_value < 0.01 ? 'high' : 'moderate'} statistical significance.

); case 'lead_lag': return (
{/* Primary Metrics */}
Lag Time
L
{details.lag_seconds}s
Time Delay
Direction
D
{details.direction}
Causal Flow
Granger Score
G
{details.granger_score?.toFixed(3)}
Causality Test
{/* Detailed Metrics Grid */}
Temporal Analysis
Correlation: {details.correlation?.toFixed(3)}
Lag Strength: {Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.8 ? 'Very Strong' : Math.abs(details.correlation) > 0.6 ? 'Strong' : 'Moderate'}
Time Window: {details.lag_seconds < 60 ? `${details.lag_seconds}s` : `${(details.lag_seconds / 60).toFixed(1)}m`}
Statistical Confidence
Confidence: {(details.confidence * 100)?.toFixed(1)}%
Significance: {details.confidence > 0.95 ? 'Very High' : details.confidence > 0.8 ? 'High' : 'Medium'}
Causality Level: {details.granger_score > 0.8 ? 'Strong' : details.granger_score > 0.5 ? 'Moderate' : 'Weak'}
{/* Interpretation */}
Interpretation

This lead-lag relationship shows a {details.direction} causal flow with a {details.lag_seconds}-second delay. The Granger score of {details.granger_score?.toFixed(3)} indicates {details.granger_score > 0.8 ? 'strong' : 'moderate'} causality, with {(details.confidence * 100)?.toFixed(1)}% confidence. This suggests that changes in one event {details.direction === 'lead' ? 'precede' : 'follow'} changes in the other by {details.lag_seconds} seconds.

); case 'pmi_correlation': return (
{/* Primary Metrics */}
PMI Score
PMI
{details.pmi_score?.toFixed(2)}
Pointwise Mutual Information
Support
S
{details.support}
Co-occurrence Count
Confidence
C
{(details.confidence * 100)?.toFixed(1)}%
Statistical Confidence
{/* Detailed Metrics Grid */}
Statistical Metrics
Total Buckets: {details.total_buckets}
PMI Raw Value: {details.pmi_score?.toFixed(4)}
Support Ratio: {((details.support / details.total_buckets) * 100)?.toFixed(2)}%
Quality Indicators
Significance Level: {details.confidence > 0.95 ? 'High' : details.confidence > 0.8 ? 'Medium' : 'Low'}
PMI Strength: {details.pmi_score > 3 ? 'Very Strong' : details.pmi_score > 2 ? 'Strong' : details.pmi_score > 1 ? 'Moderate' : 'Weak'}
Data Coverage: {((details.support / details.total_buckets) * 100) > 10 ? 'Good' : 'Limited'}
{/* Interpretation */}
Interpretation

This PMI correlation indicates a {details.pmi_score > 3 ? 'very strong' : details.pmi_score > 2 ? 'strong' : 'moderate'} co-occurrence pattern between the events. With {details.support} occurrences out of {details.total_buckets} total buckets ({(details.support / details.total_buckets * 100)?.toFixed(1)}% coverage), this represents a statistically significant relationship with {(details.confidence * 100)?.toFixed(1)}% confidence.

); case 'change_attribution': return (
{/* Primary Metrics */}
Correlation
R
{details.correlation_coefficient?.toFixed(3)}
Change Correlation
Lag Time
T
{details.lag_minutes?.toFixed(1)}m
Time Delay
Change Events
C
{details.change_count}
Total Changes
{/* Detailed Metrics Grid */}
Change Analysis
Effect Count: {details.effect_count}
Attribution Rate: {((details.effect_count / details.change_count) * 100)?.toFixed(1)}%
Correlation Strength: {Math.abs(details.correlation_coefficient) > 0.8 ? 'Very Strong' : Math.abs(details.correlation_coefficient) > 0.6 ? 'Strong' : 'Moderate'}
Temporal Impact
Lag Window: {details.lag_minutes < 60 ? `${details.lag_minutes?.toFixed(1)}m` : `${(details.lag_minutes / 60)?.toFixed(1)}h`}
Change Frequency: {details.change_count > 100 ? 'High' : details.change_count > 50 ? 'Medium' : 'Low'}
Impact Level: {details.effect_count > 50 ? 'High' : details.effect_count > 20 ? 'Medium' : 'Low'}
{/* Interpretation */}
Interpretation

This change attribution analysis shows a {Math.abs(details.correlation_coefficient) > 0.8 ? 'very strong' : 'strong'} correlation between changes and their effects, with a {details.lag_minutes?.toFixed(1)}-minute lag. Out of {details.change_count} total changes, {details.effect_count} resulted in measurable effects ({(details.effect_count / details.change_count * 100)?.toFixed(1)}% attribution rate). This suggests a {details.lag_minutes < 30 ? 'short-term' : 'medium-term'} causal relationship between the events.

); default: return ( 
              {JSON.stringify(details, null, 2)}
); } }; return (
{/* Filters and Search */}

Filter Anomalies

{filteredAnomalies.length} of {anomalies.length} anomalies
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 rounded-lg text-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Table */}
{filteredAnomalies.map((anomaly, index) => ( {expandedRows.has(anomaly.id) && ( )} ))}
Anomaly Details Type Severity Detected Actions
{anomaly.message}
ID: {anomaly.id}
{getTypeIcon(anomaly.type)} {formatTypeLabel(anomaly.type)}
{anomaly.severity.toUpperCase()}
{new Date(anomaly.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString()}
{new Date(anomaly.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

Technical Details

{renderDetails(anomaly)}
{filteredAnomalies.length === 0 && (

No Anomalies Found

No anomalies match the current filter criteria.

)}
); }; export default AnomaliesTable;
